ctu_text: 6,000/- under Dr Muthulakshmi Reddy Maternity Financial Assistance Scheme of the Government of Tamil Nadu. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "When the Sri Lankan Tamil refugee women are pregnant, they are administered tetanus injections by the nurses from the concerned Primary Health Centers (PHCs), after appropriate medical check-ups. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Required medical counselling is provided to pregnant women every month, after appropriate medical check-ups. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Pregnant women are provided with required vitamin tablets, milk, fruits and bread under the Integrated Child Development Scheme (ICDS).

ctu_text: "}]}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 3, "value": "composite", "label": "Composite"}, "benefits": [{"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "(a) Food for Temporary Stay in Different Camps", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "In Quarantine Camp refugees are provided cooked food @ \u20b9 45/- per day per adult, and @ \u20b9 30/- per day per child. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Refugees in Special Camps are provided cooked food @ \u20b9 70/- per day per adult. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Step 2: ", "bold": true}, {"text": "After ensuring that they do not belong to any militant groups/movements, they are permitted to stay in the regular camps. If it is known that they are associates of militant movements, it is then recommended to lodge them in the special camps.
